name: IrmingerSea Time-Series Station FX9 Bottle Data
description: Time series data of total alkalinity, dissolved inorganic carbon, partial CO2 pressure, inorganic nutrients, salinity and temperature collected from discrete samples and profile observations in the North Atlantic Ocean for monitoring carbonate chemistry in icelandic waters.

subjectOf.description: Dissolved inorganic carbon (DIC), total alkalinity, temperature, salinity, nutrients and dissolved oxygen collected from discrete samples and profile observations during the R/Vs Arni Fridriksson and Bjarni Saemundsson Irminger Sea (FX9) time series cruises in the North Atlantic Ocean.

provider.legalName: NOAA NESDIS National Centers for Environmental Information
provider.name: NCEI

subevent.name: Biogeochemical measurements until 1986
subevent.description: Hydrographic bottle measurements at IrmingerSea TS from 1983 until 1986

potentialAction.name: Determination of phosphate
object: Carrier solution: Low nutrient sea water (LNSW)

potentialAction.name: Determination of total dissolved inorganic carbon
result: total dissolved inorganic carbon per seawatar mass

potentialAction.name: Determination of partial pressure of carbon dioxide
result: partial pressure of carbon dioxide of sample
